title.narrative: Market development - Making markets work for the poor

description.narrative: This activity (Market development - Making markets work for the poor) is a component of Private Sector Development programme in the Democratic Republic of Congo reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £46,294,449. This component benefits Congo (Democratic Republic), and works in the following sector(s): Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International. The start date is 19-07-2012 and the end date is 06-02-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Industry - Economic Affairs - Industry - development and services
